author: Mrs Whitehead
content:
We’ve had an amazing time whilst hiring…

We’ve had an amazing time whilst hiring one of these fantastic hot tubs.  The two men who delivered and set up were extremely polite and professional and explained really clearly how to use it!  The Gazebo we hired with it was great to keep the wind of us and once decorated with fairy lights and 40th birthday posters gave my husband a wonderful surprise to celebrate his special birthday.  Wouldn’t hesitate to use this company again in the future. Thank you so much Lisa Whitehead
